node.message: This is ship MOB451 on a trading route.
I'm sure you're pirates. Prepare to die!
Don't shoot! We are innocent merchants!
I'm sure you are pirates. Prepare to die!

node.option: All right. Proceed to your destination!

node.message: Don't shoot! Don't shoot! We'll turn around!
>This is ship MX43 on a trading route.
Please carry on!
Yeah? Whose leg are you trying to pull?
What?! We are just harmless traders!
Unfortunately, I don't believe you. Die!
OK. I'll let you pass.
Hey! Don't fire! We're going, you trigger happy maniac!
Ship, please state name and destination!
This is ECHO, following a trading course.
Thank's, ECHO. Continue on present course.

node.option: Hey! I could use a bit of target practice!
node.message: Are you interested in explosions?
Thank you very much!
You must be crazy!
Not intersted? That's a real shame...
Go on, you've caught me on a good day.
I've got a bad feeling about this... I'm outta here!
This is the trading ship Bravox.
Bravox, proceed to your destination!

node.option: How much will you pay?
node.message: How much will you pay, for not being turned into space debris?
Hey! I'm sure your commander will be unhappy to hear of this behaviour!
No cash? Prepare to be destroyed!

node.option: Only joking, Bravox, you may proceed!
node.message: Bravox, proceed to your destination!
This is outrageous! I think we had better leave...
Ship, please identify.
This is the trade ship Max4.
Continue on present course, Max4!

node.option: Trade ship? You look like Bandits to me!
node.message: Trade ship? You look like Bandits to me! If you pay me, I might let you go...
Good! I was just about to call my Lawyer.
I spent all my money on this ship! But if you let me go I will pay you later.
I don't believe you, pay or pray!
Get lost, before I change my mind!
Please don't shoot me! I didn't do anything! Your lawyer will hear about this!
You leave me no choice! You must die!
Miserable wretch! Get out of my sight!
I'm going! I can see that you are an unreasonable man...
Ok, but don't expect me to forget this!
This is spaceship Horse on a trading route.
Continue to your destination!

node.option: Why are you flying around?
node.message: Why are you flying around? It makes me mad!
Cheers, buddy!
Sorry bud. Just a bit nervous...

node.option: All right. I'll let you go.
node.message: Continue to your destination!
Don't shoot! Don't shoot! I'll leave!
This is ship MX1O9 on a trading route.
So who is a better target, me or you?
This is an unarmed merchant ship. Let us pass, or we'll report this incident!

node.option: So you want to get away?
node.message: So you want to get away without fighting? What are you, chicken or McFly?

node.option: All right. I'll let you go.

node.message: As I said, this is a merchant ship. You have 5 seconds to let us on our way, or I will complain to your headquarters.
So, chicken, die!

node.option: All right, I'll let you go.

node.message: Don't shoot! Don't shoot! I'll leave!
This is ship Krondox on a trading route.
So who is a better target, me or you?
This is an unarmed merchant ship. Let us pass, or we'll report this incident!

node.option: So you want to get away?
node.message: So you want to get away without fighting? What are you, chicken or McFly?

node.option: All right. I'll let you go.

node.message: As I said, this is a merchant ship. You have 5 seconds to let us on our way, or I will report you to headquarters.
So, chicken, die!

node.option: All right, I'll let you go.

node.message: Don't shoot! Don't shoot! I'll leave!

node.option: This is the Empire Armed Forces.
node.message: This is the Empire Armed Forces. Cease fire!
Really? I think we've got something for you...

node.option: This is the Empire Armed Forces.
node.message: This is the Empire Armed Forces. Cease fire!
Leave while you can!
Stop fighting at once!
O.K. You asked for it.

node.option: Leave the merchant ship alone!
node.message: Cease fire! Leave the merchant ship alone!
Hey, a big fish! Let's get 'em boys.

node.option: Halt! This is the Empire Armed Forces.
node.message: Halt! This is the Empire Armed Forces. Cease fire!
I think it's time to leave, boys.

node.option: Halt! This is the Empire Armed Forces.
node.message: Halt! This is the Empire Armed Forces. Cease fire!
Really? I think we've got something for you...

node.option: This is the Empire Armed Forces.
node.message: This is the Empire Armed Forces. Cease fire!
Leave while you can!
Stop fighting at once!
O.K. You asked for it.

node.option: Leave the merchant ship alone.
node.message: Leave the merchant ship alone. Cease fire!
Hey, another human! Let's skin him!

node.option: Halt! This is the Empire Armed Forces. Cease fire!
node.message: Halt! This is the Empire Armed Forces. Cease fire! Leave that ship in peace!
Kill them!

node.option: O.K. Garthogs, retreat while you can!
node.message: O.K. Garthogs, retreat while you still can!
Let us pass, Earthling, and you may live.
Yeah? Big shots, huh?
Prepare to die!
Pirate1: Remember me, Lieutenant? You saved my life. Now, I've brought my friends along to have some fun.

node.option: O.K. Garthogs, retreat while you can!
node.message: O.K. Garthogs, retreat while you still can!
Let us pass, earthling, and you may live.
I'd rather teach you to dance!
Prepare to die!
O.K. pirates, retreat while you still can!
We will show no mercy. You may survive. But we just want the cargo.
You'll die!
We shall see...

node.option: Ships, identify yourselves!
node.message: Ships, identify yourselves! Cease fire! -wingman1- Hey, Captain there are two pirate groups battling it out. Let's leave them! It makes our lives easier. Let them kill each other!
-pirate1- I can't hold them off much longer! Please help! I'll be killed!
Stop in the name of the Empire!
All right, we'll look for another target. We'll meet this traitor again.
All right, we'll leave them alone.
O.K. Garthogs, retreat while you still can!
Let us pass, earthling, and you may live.
I'd rather teach you to dance!
Prepare to die!
O.K. Garthogs, retreat while you still can!
Let us pass, earthling, and you may live.
I'd rather teach you to dance!
Prepare to die!
O.K. Garthogs, retreat while you still can!
Let us pass, earthling, and you may live.
I'd rather teach you to dance!
Prepare to die!
Turn around at once!
Khhz Hrrrz. .he .ad.o is n.t wo.ki...

node.option: This planet is under blockade!
node.message: This planet is under blockade! You must return at once!
kkkhhhz. Krr.rrrr
O.K. Garthogs, retreat while you still can!
Let us pass, earthling, and you may live.
I'd rather teach you to dance!
Prepare to die!
O.K. Garthogs, retreat while you still can!
Let us pass, earthling, and you may live.
I'd rather teach you to dance!
Prepare to die!
Virus carriers prepare to die!
Bip... bip... bip-bip..

node.option: Turn around at once!
node.message: This is the Interplanetary Police calling. Turn around at once! I repeat, turn around! This planet is under blockade.

This is the Governor of Planet Zeuson. I have been falsely accused for crimes committed against the Empire. I know, the admiralty wishes to see me in prison, but I wish to face their charges myself. Let me pass to attend the court, so I can defend my honor.
I understand. You may pass.
You must return!
I see you are a man of integrity. We are of the same type, you know. Thank you, Commander.

I warn you, Commander, that if you resist, I must command my ships to open fire. And that could lead to the loss of innocent lives. ...Think about it... I'm sure you do not wish to send your crew to their deaths. Let me pass!

node.option: Give me your word you will go direct to court...
node.message: You MUST go and attend the hearing.
Do not threaten me. You must return!
Don't worry, my young captain. I will.
All right. You asked for it.
O.K. Garthogs, retreat while you still can!
Let us pass, earthling, and you may live.
I'd rather teach you to dance!
Prepare to die!
